metadata.description: Enter the name of resource group to be created for Iot Hub, Storage Account and Web App.

Enter the name of resource group to be created for Edge device. It is required if 'Use Existing Edge Device' is set to 'No'. If a value is not provided here, the device will be created in 'Resource Group Iot' resource group
Specify the architecture of the Edge Device. Currently supported values are 'X86' and 'ARM64'.

Select value for runtime for Detector module on Edge Device. Set it to 'CPU' to use CPU to run detector module. If the Edge Device has Nvidia GPU, set it to 'NVIDIA' to use GPU to run detector module or to use movidius set it to 'MOVIDIUS'.
Specify the password for the web app.
Select whether you want to use an existing Edge device or create a new one
Enter the name of existing Iot Hub. This is required only if 'Use Existing Edge Device' is set to 'Yes'
Enter the name of existing IoT Edge device. This is required only if 'Use Existing Edge Device' is set to 'Yes'
